SEARCH
Module com.example.showSequencerJavafx
Package com.example.showSequencerJavafx

Class Fader

java.lang.Object
com.example.showSequencerJavafx.Fader
public class Fader extends Object
Fader class to store information for a fader channel in the fader desk. Sends command to fader desk to set desk fader to new volume.

      public Fader(int faderNum, String name, boolean isMix, int value, boolean isVisible)
      Constructor for Fader. Sets variables.
      Parameters:
      faderNum - Number of fader in fader list
      name - User input name of fader
      isMix - True if mix, false otherwise
      value - Channel number of fader
      isVisible - True if visible, false otherwise
